channel.title: HP bar on a second place
channel.description:
hello everybody, my server doesn't have a hp orb, don't care about that but insteed of a hp orb I would draw a hp bar (like that one above the had of the player) next to the map but do I have the code then
I'm new in rsps coding

item.title: HP bar on a second place
item.dc:creator: @slimmerd3 slimmerd3
item.source: HP bar on a second place

item.title: HP bar on a second place
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“slimmerd3, post:1, topic:481435”]hello everybody,
my server doesn’t have a hp orb, don’t care about that
but insteed of a hp orb I would draw a hp bar (like that one above the had of the player) next to the map
but do I have the code then

I’m new in rsps coding[/quote]
Not to be offensive or anything, but if you’re new tho the coding scene… I don’t see you getting this done without some form of spoonfeeding.

What you’d need to do:
Make a custom sprite of the HP bars, about 4x bigger (depending of what one’s you are using).
Have the client load the sprites, in the correct position.
Make the sprites so they can actually ‘drain’
Have the server modify the sprites length to which the person’s HP is.

Read full topic
item.source: HP bar on a second place
